competitors.name: Dassault Syst√®mes
competitors.notes: CATIA and SOLIDWORKS CAD, ENOVIA PLM

context: In 2010, PTC competed with Pro/ENGINEER (later Creo) against CATIA and NX in high-end CAD. Windchill competed with Teamcenter and ENOVIA in PLM. The mid-market saw SOLIDWORKS and Inventor competition. PTC was transitioning from perpetual licensing toward subscription models. The market was maturing with focus on PLM integration across enterprise. SolidWorks (Dassault) dominated mid-market CAD.
